summary: DT:  THE CONTACT OWNS A 1998 CHEVROLET VENTURE.  TWO MONTHS AGO SHE HAD TO REPLACE THE ENGINE DUE TO THE CAM SHAFT BREAKING. SHE REPLACED THE OLD ENGINE WITH A NEW ONE.  ONE WEEK LATER THE CAM SHAFT  BROKE AGAIN ON THE SAME SPOT AS THE OTHER.  MECHANIC SAID THAT HE HAD NEVER HEARD OF A HOLLOW CAMSHAFT, AND THAT WAS THE WAY ALL CAM SHAFTS WERE FOR THIS VEHICLE.*AK
